The review bombing is definitely unwarranted.Where Part II falls down is some clumsy writing that pulls you out of an otherwise immersive story with a stunningly crafted visuals world and excellent gameplay. Some of the character motivations are just completely plot-driven and feel so forced as to make some of what you are doing - or rather\, why you are doing it - feel stupid and a little too unbelievable. Similarly\, the pacing was a little clumsy with the game falling off a cliff at the mid-way point.Also - the decision to have a heavily pregnant woman travel out into hostile territory on patrol and have her climbing about and fighting etc. was... well just plain weird. I'm all for body positivity - but that was completely insane.I don't have a problem with any of the characters themselves and disagree with most of the negative reviews. But some of the writing is definitely just plain bad.Very much hope TLOU3 can be a thing. It's a great world that deserves more storytelling.… Expand
